briefTitle: Effects of Herbal Products on Reduction of Radiation-induced Dermatitis in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Effects of Herbal Products on Reduction of Radiation-induced Dermatitis in Breast Cancer Patients
conditions: Radiodermatitis, Breast Neoplasms, Adverse Effect of Radiation Therapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Aged 20 years old or older,
* Diagnosed with Breast cancer
* On course of external Radiation therapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant
* Previously underwent external Radiation therapy
* Illiterate
